CustomField.description: We have limited availability for Volunteers to stay on-site. Would you like to request to stay on-site (accommodations vary) or do you plan to book your own lodging at a nearby hotel?
CustomField.label: Plan to Book Own Lodging?

value.fullName: I would like to request to stay on site
value.label: I would like to request to stay on site

value.fullName: I plan to book a hotel, or have alternate lodging
value.label: I plan to book a hotel, or have alternate lodging
